basics.name: Jermaine Bruno
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Information and Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2026.

highlights: Provided exceptional customer service in a fast-paced, high-volume restaurant environment. Took accurate orders, delivered food promptly, and ensured a positive dining experience for all guests. Collaborated with team members to maintain cleanliness, organization, and efficient workflow. Developed strong communication, multitasking, and problem-solving skills while managing customer requests and resolving issues professionally.

work.summary: Skilled in the maintenance, repair, and inspection of wheeled military and civilian vehicles.
highlights: Supported Missions Overseas in the INDOPACOM region. Proficient in diagnosing mechanical, electrical, and hydraulic systems to ensure operational readiness and safety. Experienced in performing preventive maintenance, troubleshooting complex issues, and adhering to technical manuals and safety standards. Strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work efficiently under pressure.

awards.title: AFCEA Educational Foundation Award
awards.awarder: Armed Forces Communications & Electronics Association International
awards.summary: Academic Achievement awarded to students in STEM fields such as Computer Science.

awards.title: The Army Reserve Components Achievement Medal
awards.summary: U.S. Army award recognizing consistent honorable service in a Reserve Component unit.
